Method Detail

start

public void start(java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket)
           throws java.nio.channels.NotYetBoundException,
                  java.lang.SecurityException,
                  java.io.IOException
Accepts incoming requests on serverSocket and dispatches using the ExecutorService passed in from the constructor. This method blocks the calling thread until stop() is called by another thread or the given ServerSocket is no longer bound.

Parameters:
serverSocket - The server socket to accept incoming client requests on. This socket must be bound before calling this method.
Throws:
java.nio.channels.NotYetBoundException - If the given ServerSocket is not already bound.
java.lang.SecurityException - If a security manager exists and its checkAccept method doesn't allow the operation.
java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs when waiting for a connection.

stop

public void stop()
